task.title: Whitelist a User
task.shortdesc: Whitelist a user to allow them to post directly to Apps without being moderatated.

context.p: Whitelisting Users allows them to post directly to your Apps. Content posted by whitelisted users will not pass through Livefyreâ€™s SAFE, profanity, or premoderation filters, and will be automatically approved and added to the App.

step.cmd: A popup will appear that allows you to whitelist the user for the entire network, or for a specific site. (Use the CTR or Command key to select multiple sites.)
Click Whitelist to complete the process.
